title: III DEDUCTIBLE
sample_text:
The Company shall not be liable for each and every claim under Section - I (loss of or 
damage to the vehicle insured) of this Policy in respect of the deductible stated in the 
schedule.

in the Policy the Company‟s liability is limited to Rs. 6000/- (Rupees six thousand only) for 
damage to property other than the property belonging to the Insured or held in trust or in 
custody or control of the Insured
